tasks.label: R: PermuteBuild
tasks.command: set -euo pipefail && /usr/local/bin/R CMD INSTALL --library=build-lib . && USE_OPENMP=1 /usr/local/bin/R CMD INSTALL --library=build-lib . && USE_CPP20=1 /usr/local/bin/R CMD INSTALL --library=build-lib . && USE_OPENMP=1 USE_CPP20=1 /usr/local/bin/R CMD INSTALL --library=build-lib .
